Pontins Hemsby (Championship Section) 5 Test Piece Contest Pontins (Hemsby) - Qualifiers pontins-hemsby-championship-section Pontins (Championship Section)
Journey into Freedom
Hemsby Holiday Centre, Norfolk Prizes - 1st £600 and trophy, 2nd £300, 3rd £200, 4th £150, 5th £100, 6th £75. 10 bands competed.
